CSSMath-depth.summary: The math-depth property describes a notion of depth for each element of a mathematical formula, with respect to the top-level container of that formula. This is used to scale the computed value of the font-size of elements when font-size: math is applied.

blockquote.para: Note: font-size: math is the default for <math> elements in the MathML Core User Agent stylesheet, so it's not necessary to specify it explicitly.
